title: Earth Cafe Marrakech
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Juice bar, European, Moroccan, Turkish
description: Offers vegetarian cuisine made with seasonal ingredients from farm to table, owner's own farm. No alcohol. This location is all veg while their other location in Marrakech is veg-friendly but not pure veg.
streetAddress: 2, Derb Zawak, Riad Zitoun Kedim, Medina
